scripts.start: concurrently 'node_modules/.bin/stylus --watch --out static static/index.styl' 'node_modules/.bin/pug --watch static --name-after-file --pretty --no-debug' 'node ./server data' 'node_modules/.bin/open-cli http://127.0.0.1:8000'
scripts.build: sh -c 'node_modules/.bin/stylus --out static static/index.styl; node_modules/.bin/pug static --name-after-file --pretty --no-debug; rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; ../node_modules/.bin/electron-packager  .. auditor --overwrite --platform linux,win32,darwin --arch x64 --prune=true --version-string.CompanyName=Wartech --version-string.FileDescription=Wartech --version-string.ProductName=Auditor; for i in *; do zip -r $i.zip $i; done'
